synonyms: navame—in the Ninth Chapter; kahiluṅ—I have described; dakṣiṇa-tīrtha-bhramaṇa—going on pilgrimage in South India; daśame—in the Tenth Chapter; kahiluṅ—I have described; sarva-vaiṣṇava-milana—meeting of all kinds of devotees.
translation: In the Ninth Chapter I have described the Lord's tour of South India and the different places of pilgrimage. In the Tenth Chapter I have described the meeting of all the devotees of the Lord.
